players.name: Bob
memory: Charlie: "Charlie is the detective and he knows who the mafioso is."
You: "Bob is one of us, the mafia. We need to keep him safe."
Diana: "I will remain silent for now. Let's see what happens tonight."
Charlie: "I will continue to investigate and gather more information. Let's see what happens tonight."
You: "I am the mafioso and I killed Alice last night. I will continue to protect Bob as he is one of us."
